credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Charles T. Cook
dimensions:
Overall: 3 3/8 x 1 3/4 in. (8.6 x 4.5 cm)
rim: 13/16 in. (2 cm)
title: Unguentarium
description: Thick natural, bluish-green glass. Plump, pear-shaped body. Tubular neck, constricted at bottom. Small rim folded in. Flat base. Lopsided. Mended at base and part of body reattached. Slight iridescence, some incrustation.
